system_overview.description: A comprehensive digital solution for managing pool bookings, user roles, and daily operations with strict slot-based access.
system_overview.primary_objective: To automate slot booking, enforce capacity limits, and monitor real-time attendance.

user_management: Register and manage Students, Staff, and Coaches
Ability to block or disable user accounts

calendar_management.holiday_management: Ability to mark specific dates as 'Closed' for maintenance or holidays
calendar_management.booking_lock: System must auto-prevent bookings on dates marked as 'Closed'

notice_board.display: Must be visible on the main dashboard for all users

admin_module.coach_allocation: Ability to assign one unique coach per day for a 5-day work week

constraints.auto_disable: Slot must close automatically when capacity reaches 30

booking_system.real_time_tracking: Display live available space count to users

coach: View attendee list for assigned day

non_functional_requirements.security: Secure login and role-restricted data access
